attributes.review: This is the STUPIDEST app ever!! I mean duh, it belongs to the one and only Donald Jerk Trump. I’d give it 5 stars but....never mind. I’d never give this app or the president 5 stars!! TRUMP 2020 🇺🇸 ˢᶦᵐᵖˢᵒⁿ ᴬᵈᵈᶦᵗᶦᵒⁿ 😘
